titles.title: Of inquiry directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to ending acceptance of applications and requests for COVID-19 economic injury disaster loans and advances.

Of inquiry directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to ending acceptance of applications and requests for COVID-19 economic injury disaster loans and advances.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Small Business Administration (SBA) to provide the House of Representatives with any information and documents about the SBA ending the acceptance of applications and the processing of certain requests for COVID-19 economic injury disaster loans and advances, including the total dollar amount of such loans disbursed each day during the 14-day period ending on May 5, 2022.
